description:
Description

-Dual Action, Skin Repair & Neautralizes Pigmentation: This cream combines the calming benefits of a soothing moisturizer with tone-correcting properties. It helps to naturally reduce redness and uneven skin tone, providing a healthier, more even complexion.
-Enriched with PDRN & Centella Asiatica Extract: Formulated with PDRN, Centella Asiatica, and Aloe Vera Extract, this cream nourishes and soothes irritated skin while promoting healing and restoring your skin's natural balance.
-Clinically Proven Redness Reduction: Tested to help calm skin irritated by environmental factors, this cream reduces redness by up to 66%, offering relief to sensitive, stressed skin and ensuring a more balanced, calm complexion.
-Hydrating, Lightweight & Non-Greasy: This cream has a refreshing texture that hydrates your skin with a burst of moisture, leaving it feeling soft and smooth. It absorbs quickly without a greasy finish, making it perfect for everyday use.

How To Use

Apply a moderate amount on the concerned areas and blend with a makeup puff.

description:
Description

A hydrating primer that hydrates and preps skin for makeup application.
Hydrates dry skin and instantly gives skin a dewy and glowy finish.
Contains Hyal 10 Complex and PorePare technology that effectively hydrates skin with pore care benefits.
 
How To Use
1. Take a proper amount of product and use as the first stage of makeup after skincare.
2. Apply product on whole face gently and evenly.
3. Wait for the hydrating primer to be absorbed and proceed with the makeup application.

description:
Description

[UNBEATABLE MAKEUP FIXATION] Unlock flawless, long-lasting makeup with our powerful setting fixer! Instantly form a protective layer between your skin and makeup, ensuring your look stays fresh and radiant all day long.

[24-HOUR LONG-LASTING HOLD] Experience the magic of our light air-fit polymer, creating an ultra-thin, breathable shield that locks in your makeup without clogging pores or feeling heavy. 
Our innovative powder formula absorbs excess oil, leaving your skin smooth, shine-free, and picture-perfect.

[EXPERT SEBUM CONTROL WITH GREEN APPLE] Revel in the refreshing care of patented green apple polyphenols that expertly regulate sebum production. Say goodbye to unwanted shine and hello to a clean, crisp, and invigorating makeup finish.

[SOFT BLURRING EFFECT FOR FLAWLESS SKIN] Achieve the ultimate soft-focus look with our light-scattering technology. Enjoy a beautifully blurred, flawless complexion that diminishes the appearance of pores and imperfections for a dreamy, translucent finish.
How To Use
Shake the container gently, close your eyes, and spray evenly over your entire face from a distance of 20-30 cm. Let it absorb naturally. Remember to shake well before use to activate the powder formula, and clean the nozzle tip after use to ensure optimal performance. Transform your makeup routine with our advanced setting fixer and enjoy all-day confidence and impeccable beauty!

product_name: Second Skin Tone Up Base (3 colors)
description:
Description

Achieve a flawless complexion with hince's Second Skin Tone Up Base! This multi-functional makeup base not only provides sun protection with SPF 50+ PA+++, but also corrects and brightens skin while prolonging makeup wear. The light-up fitting formula and Sea Daffodil Extract work together to enhance your natural beauty and prevent hyperpigmentation. Available in 3 shades.

Hydration-packed Aqua Velvet Polymer ingredient adds deep hydration to dry skins for more even and brighter skin tone and texture.

The fluid type formula of this UV shielding tone-up base provides lightweight finish that does not feel heavy on skin.
 
How To Use
Lightly shake up the bottle. Take a moderate amount of the base and gently apply on the skin. Spread evenly and apply more if needed.

 
Key Ingredients
Water, Boron Nitride, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Homosalate, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Polysilicone-15, Cyclopentasiloxane, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Cyclohexasiloxane, Polysorbate 80, Polysorbate 60, Isohexadecane, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Isododecane, Dipropylene Glycol, Decyl Glucoside, Ultramarines(CI 77007), Hydroxyacetophenone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, C13-15 Alkane, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Alumina, Propylene Glycol, Mica, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Oleate, Disodium EDTA, Dimethicone, t-Butyl Alcohol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glycerin, Pancratium Maritimum Extract

description:
Description

A tone-up primer that evenly corrects and brightens your complexion with color-changing capsules, achieving a luminous and radiant finish.

Prunus Serrulata / Nymphaea Alba / Nelumbo Nucifera / Rosa Hybrid

The Pink Flower Complex, made up of four pink flowers rich in Vitamin Câcherry blossom, water lily, rose, and lotusâpromotes clear and vibrant skin while aiding in moisture retention and providing antioxidant benefits for improved skin conditioning.

This silky primer glides on smoothly without clumping, offering a natural tone-up effect with its tone-changing capsules.

Optimized for refining skin texture, covering blemishes, and enhancing makeup wear. It offers triple functional benefits of UV protection, brightening, and wrinkle improvement.

Clinically tested and low-irritant, this compact pink stick fits perfectly in one hand. The evenly distributed âColor Tone-Up Change Capsulesâ blend seamlessly with just one roll, naturally covering blemishes and enhancing skin vitality.

The capsules transform into a natural neutral skin tone as you apply, providing a subtle tone-up effect.

#UVProtection #Radiance #ToneCare #Priming

description:
Description


- Even make-up clean ingredient prescription, harmful ingredient 0% tone-up cream We have developed makeup products without harmful ingredients so that even sensitive skin can apply makeup without worry.
- With 50,000ppm of Vita Essence, skin nutrition filled even during makeup Moisturizing and providing shine to dry skin Protecting skin from external stress Keeping skin tissue healthy and strong
Biodance Skin Glow Tone-up Booster brightens the skin from the inside with 50,000ppm of Vita Essence, just like skin care during makeup.
- Perfect radiance tone-up that completes the skin without gaps Based on tone-up balancing technology, fine tone-up particles of different sizes fill in between the skin's curves to create a thin reflector.
How To Use

1.  Apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure.

2. Reapply after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every 2 hours.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.content: I ordered from here less than a week ago, got a bunch of stuff in the $8.88 sale, hit the $90 free shipping benchmark and then was able to use a coupon to pay only $75 for like a lot of great products. I didn't at all trust the 3-5 day shipping estimate, but then it arrived from South Korea to NY in 4 days?! I was impressed, not even gonna lie. I don't know why one of the reviews on here says the products are very convincing dupes, I even compared the replacement beauty of joseon sunscreen I got with the one I'm nearly out of, and it's simply the same exact product, and the other two sunscreens I got with my order are totally distinctive and great formulas, so I'm curious what their experience was...

reviews.title: My New Go 2 Daily Base Product
reviews.content: This is so~ easy to put on your face, my new go to base product for my face routine. Weightless Feel: Despite its high light to medium coverage, the hugging skin tint is known for its lightweight and comfortable feel on the skin. It doesn't feel heavy or suffocating, making it suitable for all-day wear. Wide Shade Range: for Korean base product typically offers only 2 to 3 shades, hugging skin tint however has 5 shade range to cater to different skin tones. Long-Lasting: For skin tint, hugging skin tint has excellent staying power and can withstand long hours without fading or creasing. Its long-lasting formula keeps your makeup looking fresh throughout the day.

description:
Description


1. Pore Cover: Fills pores and cares for irregularities on the face
2. Moisture maintenance: Maintains moist and smooth skin texture by supplying moisture
3. Makeup maintenance: Keep makeup that is easily smeared with sweat and sebum for a long time

Suggested Use


Take a small amount and apply to the skin. It can be covered evenly with an oil capsule that melts immediately upon contact with the skin.

Full Ingredients

description:
Description


A lightweight, serum-like base primer that sinks into skin releasing rich moisture for fresh, dewy skin.
This primer keeps skin hydrated and radiant-looking for a long-lasting glow makeup.
Skin-friendly ultrafine pearls, which are often infused into skincare products, help with a dewy, luminous finish.
 
How To Use

1. Dispense 1-2 pumps onto the back of your hand, after skincare steps.
2. Apply the primer to the center of your face and blend outwards for a thin, even layer.
3. Wait until product has fully absorbed and apply your foundation for best base makeup results.
 
Key Ingredients

water (aqua), dipropylene glycol, alcohol denat., niacinamide, betaine, glycerin, 1,2-hexanediol, polyglyceryl-10 stearate, glycereth-26, polyurethane-15, propanediol, cetearyl alcohol, tromethamine, carbomer, hydroxyethylcellulose, ceramide 3, acrylates/c10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, triethylhexanoin, butylene glycol, adenosine, lactobacillus/ginseng root ferment filtrate, squalane, saccharomyces/potato extract ferment filtrate, saccharomyces/coix lacryma-jobi ma-yuen seed ferment filtrate, phospholipids, lactobacillus/soybean ferment extract, lactobacillus/rice ferment, hydrogenated polydecene, disodium edta, calcium titanium borosilicate, cholesterol, phytosphingosine, hydrogenated lecithin, theobroma cacao (cocoa) extract, aquilaria agallocha extract, gardenia florida flower extract, tin oxide, iron oxides

description:
Description

Creates hydrating and illuminating skin by refining pores and wrinkles.
This silky primer makes your pores practically disappear and evens out skin tone. 
Start Up Pore Primer is lightweight, which makes it perfect for daily wear under makeup.
Plus, the hypoallergenic formula is suitable for those with sensitive skin.


Suggested Use

1. Before makeup, apply a moderate amount to the face thinly. 
2. You can mix with the foundation or BB cream (2:1 ratio) for an even more flawless finish.


Ingredients

Purified Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Niacinamide, Phenyl Trimethicone, Pentylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Tribehenin, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower/Leaf Extract, Origanum Majorana Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Mentha Rotundifolia Leaf Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract, Mentha Spicata Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyethylene, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Ethyl Hexanediol, Lecithin, Mastic Gum, Ethanol, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, CI 77891, CI 77492, CI77491, CI 77499

description:
Description
A color correcting, UV protective makeup base With a soft, airy creamy texture that blends seamlessly with skin Helps neutralize sallow skin by adding radiance Formulated with Ceramide Repair Water for refreshing benefits Preserves an optimal level of hydration all day long Absorbs oil to ensure longer lasting of makeup Provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection Creates a supple, sleek, moist & healthy looking complexion 

Suggested Use
Use skin veil base for skin torn up after base make up.

Pump it on tip of finger then paste onto wide side of face

For the spot needs more coverage, put a little bit of foundation more on and tap gently by finger tips
